definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: I sat in a chair and see the round moon, just like a kind of returning to the poetic.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在椅子上，看那輪圓月，就宛如一種久違的詩意。

sentences.english: At a time when I tired to stop dwelling poetically .
sentences.chinese: 在我疲倦的時候可以停下來詩意地棲居。

sentences.english: In China, in the eighth century, it entered the realm of poetry as one of the polite amusements.
sentences.chinese: 在八世紀的中國，茶就作爲雅事而進入一個詩意王國。

sentences.english: Through the application of the bamboo can awake a poetry beauty in interior design.
sentences.chinese: 通過竹材的應用體會出室內設計的詩意之美。

sentences.english: And its meaning is to use the evergreen as the metaphor of the emotion between brothers.
sentences.chinese: 而其詩意則在於用松的常青來比喻兄弟之情。

sentences.english: Living poetically is the spirit of the common pursuit of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 詩意地安居是人類共同的精神追求。

sentences.english: Wen can see the elegant fragrance, you can taste the long poetic.
sentences.chinese: 可以聞見淡雅的清香，可以品味悠長的詩意。

sentences.english: very nobly and poetically. That's what I call a romantic atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 思想高雅而有詩意，那就是我所說的浪漫。

sentences.english: And the more modern "poet" unilaterally the poetic Word.
sentences.chinese: 而當代“詩人”多把詩意片面地理解成文字美。

sentences.english: Who would describe the poetry of your dream in this ariose age?
sentences.chinese: 誰將描繪你夢中的詩意？在這個如歌的歲月裏。

sentences.english: The expression of art mind and poesy in her novels.
sentences.chinese: 在陳染文本中，處處可見她的藝術心境和詩意表達。

sentences.english: Habitat busy submarine, to enjoy a quiet alley door of poetic life.
sentences.chinese: 潛居鬧市，安享靜巷名門的詩意生活。

sentences.english: It is an admirable thing that the poetry of a people is the element of its progress.
sentences.chinese: 奇妙的是，一個民族的詩意是它進步的原素。

sentences.english: Beauty is non-reality. It is being of poetic quality.
sentences.chinese: 美在非現實性，美就是詩意棲居。

sentences.english: Life is poetically compared to the morning dew.
sentences.chinese: 人生被富有詩意地比喻爲朝露。

sentences.english: They are a sort of literary manifestation and aesthetic design about humanity' poetic existence.
sentences.chinese: 這是京派作家對人類詩意生存的文學表達及美學設計。
